properties.Name: Scope3Category2CapitalGoodsHybridMethodMaterialsInput
properties.Description: The materials input associated with the scope 3 category 2  hybrid method for calculating emissions.

Columns.Name: ReportingLegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: CapitalGoodsTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Capital Goods Type.

Columns.Name: MaterialTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a material type.

Columns.Name: MaterialPurchasedUnits
Columns.Description:
The quantity of material purchased.

sum across purchased goods or services:
(quantities of good purchased (e.g., kg) x supplier-specific product emission factor of purchased good or service (e.g., kg CO2 e/kg))

Columns.Name: MaterialPurchasedUomId
Columns.Description:
The material purchased units of measure.

Ex:
- kg
- Service hours

Columns.Name: MaterialsPurchasedTotalDistanceOfTransferUnits
Columns.Description: The total distance of transfer associated with the material.

Columns.Name: MaterialsPurchasedTotalDistanceOfTransferUomId
Columns.Description: The material purchased total distance units of measure.

Columns.Name: MaterialsPurchasedValueAmount
Columns.Description: The value of the materials purchased.

Columns.Name: TotalCo2EEmissionsUomId
Columns.Description: The emission factor units of measure.
